title: Guru Purnima Anugraha Bhashanam
description: The sacred Anugraha Bhashanam delivered by the Jagadguru on the auspicious occasion of Guru Purnima. A discourse on the importance of the Guru-shishya parampara.

title: Sharada Navaratri Darbar
description: A glimpse into the royal court (Darbar) held nightly during Navaratri, where the Jagadguru presides in regal splendor, a tradition continuing for centuries.
